text: Ðis synd þa landgemæra into wican.
Ærest of temede ge myðan andlang temede in wynnabæces ge myðan.
Of wynna bæce in wuda mor.
Of wuda more in wætan sice.
Of þam wætan sice in þa bakas.
And of þam bakan in þa ealdan dic.
Of ðære ealdan dic in secges mere.
And of secges mere in þes pulles heafod.
Andlong to þornbrycge.
Of þornbryccge in kadera pull.
Of kadera pulle in beka brycge.
Of becha brycge in forewardan hipes mor.
Of þam more innon coforð broc.
Of þam broke innon þone hagan.
Æfter þam hagan innon kett.
Of kette in þa hlawas of þam hlawan in Lawern.
Of Lawerne in<../images/tbar.gif>atsic.
And æfter þam sice.
Innon þa scipac.
And of þære scipac in þa gratan æspan.
And swa in<../images/tbar.gif>hreade sloh.
Of þam slo innon þa hlawas.
And of þam hlawan in fif acana weg.
And æfter þam wege innon þa fif æcc.
Of þam acan innon ðrim gemæran.
Of þrim gemæran in lacge burnan.
Of ðære burnan to mila stane.
Of þam stane on þa haran apeltreo.
Of þære apeltreo innon doferic.
Æfter doferice in sæferne & andlang sæferne in temede muðan.
